definition: variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: She stoops to turn down his trouser ends.
sentences.chinese: 她彎下腰去把卷起的褲腳放下來。

definition: to wrap up/(fig.) to envelop/to swallow up
to raise one's head/to perk up
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
